  22. ‌let history = ref ([] : int64 list)

  24. ‌let empty_history () =
  25.   history := []

  27. ‌let add_current_time () =
  28.   let time = current_time () in
  29.     if !history = [] then
  30.       history := [time]
  31.     else if time <> List.hd !history then
  32.       history := list_truncate !history_size (time::!history)

  34. ‌let previous_time_1 () =
  35.   match !history with
  36.     _::((time::_) as hist) ->
  37.       history := hist; time
  38.   | _ ->
  39.       prerr_endline "No more information."; raise Toplevel

  41. ‌let rec previous_time n =
  42.   if n = _1
  43.   then previous_time_1()
  44.   else begin ignore(previous_time_1()); previous_time(pre64 n) end
